    <td>

    <td>

    </td>

      <p>
        1) Delete a file
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Deletion is propagated through all folders
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        5
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Renaming a file with 2 different names
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a file at 1 folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Rename a file at another folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync it
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        At least 2 new files created
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        6
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Deleting a file , update from another tagged folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete a file
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Update the same file from another folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync it
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        All folders should reflect the updated file
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        7
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename a file and update the contents.
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a file
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Update the contents
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync it
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Every tagged folder should have 2 files in this case
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        8
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Delete the file and create a new one with the same name
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete a file
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Create a new file similar to (1)
      </p>
      <p>
        4) Sync
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        All folders will show the same file again
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        9
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename a file from a folder , delete the old file
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a file from a folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Delete the old file from the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        All folders should only show the renamed file
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Create a file in all folders
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Create a new file in all folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        No change on each folder. But XML should be updated
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        X1
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename a file from 2 folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a file from 2 folders
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        The file that is non-renamed will have syncless archive
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        XII
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Delete the same file in every folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete the file in each folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync them
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        XML will be updated
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        XIII
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Untag a folder and tag it again
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Untag a folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Delete the files in it
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Tag the folder removed in (1)
      </p>
      <p>
        4) Sync again
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        The file will be repropagated again
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>

      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Renamed folder is propagated to all folders

    <td>

    <td>
      <p>

    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete a folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Deletion of folder is propagated to all folders
      </p>

  </tr>

    </td>

      </p>
      <p>

    <td>
      <p>
        Renamed folder will propagate over
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        5
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Delete a folder , create a subfolder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete 1 of the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Create a sub folder in another folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Deletion will propagate through all folders
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        6
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename 2 levels of folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Rename the subfolder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename will propagate through all levels
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        7
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename folder in 2 different folders
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a folder in a folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Rename it to another name in another folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync now
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        All folders will reflect the different rename
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        8
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Delete a folder and create a new folder of the same name
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete the folder in all folders
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Create a folder in either of the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Will delete the folder
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        9
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Deletion of sub folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Delete the sub folder in either of the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Will delete the sub folder
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        X
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename the folder and delete the sub-folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Delete the sub-folder
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Sync over
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Will rename the folder and delete the sub-folder
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        X1
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename a different folder at different level
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename a folder at different
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync them
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Will merge all the renamed folders in every level
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        XII
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Create a new folder in each folder
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Create a new folder in each folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync them
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        XML should reflect all the created folders
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        XIII
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Rename all the folders
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Rename all the folder
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Sync them
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        XML should reflect all the created folders
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <p>
        XIV
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        Untag the folder and tag it again
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        1) Create a folder in all and sync
      </p>
      <p>
        2) Untag the folder , delete the folder in the rest
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Retag the folder and sync
      </p>
    </td>
    <td >
      <p>
        Will repropagate the deleted folder
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

      <p>
        2) Remove the thumb drive and delete the file and sync
      </p>
      <p>
        3) Update the file content in the thumbdrive
      </p>
      <p>
        4) Plug the thumbdrive back and sync
      </p>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p>
        The newly modified file in the thumbdrive will propagate to the rest
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>
    </td>
    <td>
    </td>
    <td>
    </td>
    <td>
    </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
